message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $13,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $13,000 is a bit high. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,500. Can you consider that?
